Articles.Content:
Been playing for about 40 hours.  I swear it took 30 to get used to the control mapping on the Xbox.  This could really use a close look at Elite Dangerous in comparison with regard to ease of use.  The way the controls are mapped doesn't make sense fundamentally.

Why isn't Yaw on the triggers?

Doesn't it seem like Pitch & Roll should be left stick?

Why do so many functions say Right Bumper or Left Bumper + X?  It's confusing enough without having the option of choosing a bumper to push.  Makes me feel like I'm missing something fundamental here.  Why aren't the bumpers mapped differently for holds?

Is there going to be a redux on the left stick mouse cursor sensitivity?  It tracks pretty binary, like going from 0-100 half way through stick movements.
